title: Tour de France stage 5: Jai Hindley doubles up, Jonas Vingegaard gaps Tadej Poga훾ar in stunner
content:
Hindley wins stage to snatch yellow, and defending Tour champion didn't waste any time to impose his will on the race and delivers surprising early blow to Poga훾ar.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 5: Jai Hindley doubles up, Jonas Vingegaard gaps Tadej Poga훾ar in stunner on Velo.
